title: GitLab
description: GitLab is a well-recognized brand in the software development domain, known for its vibrant and cohesive color palette that includes shades of orange and red, specifically FCA326, FC6D26, and E24329, complemented by a soothing 554488. These colors symbolize innovation and collaboration and are consistently used across various brand assets to establish a strong visual identity. The official sources of these colors can be verified from their artwork repository.
